Korea Watch

Edited by Harry J. Kazianis Link: https://twitter.com/GrecianFormula , the Center for the National Interest’s Korean Studies Senior Director and TNI’s Executive Editor, Korea Watch is our portal into all things Korea.

In this space, we will tackle issues such as the North Korea challenge, U.S.-DPRK relations, South Korean domestic politics and economic issues, technological innovations originating on the Korean peninsula, demographics and more.
